column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Hom nyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na emi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn meyɛ krɔnkrɔn."

column2: "Hom mu nyimpa biara nsuro ne na
column3: nye n’egya
column4: na hom ndzi m’ahomgyenda do: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mma hom nndan nnkɔ abosom hɔ
column3: nkyii so mma hom nnyɛ ehonyi a woegu no dɛ nyame mma hom ho: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dze asomdwee afɔr afɔrbɔdze rebrɛ EWURADZE a
column3: hom mfa mbra ma ɔnsɔ enyi mma hom."

column2: "Wondzi no da no ara a hom dze ba no
column3: nye n’adzekyee no: na sɛ bi ka ma okodu da a otsia ebiasa no a

column2: "Na sɛ wodzi no da a otsia ebiasa no a
column3: ɔyɛ ekyiwadze; ɔnnsɔ enyi:"

column2: "obiara a odzi no
column3: ɔbɔsoa no mbusu
column4: osiandɛ oegu EWURADZE n’adzekrɔnkrɔn ho fi: na ɔkra no wobotwa no efi ne man mu akyen."

column2: "Na sɛ hom twa hom asaase do ndɔbaa a
column3: mma nntwa wo hanoa dze no korakora
column4: nkyii so mma nndzi wo ndɔbaa ne mpɛpɛw no."

column2: "Na mma nndzi wo wenyin ture mu mpɛpɛw
column3: nkyii so mma nntase wo wenyin ture mu aba a atotɔ famu; gya no hɔ fa ma ohianyi
column4: nye ɔhɔho: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mma hom nnwia adze
column3: nkyii so mma hom nndzi nkɔnkɔnsa
column4: na obi nntwa ne nyɛnko nkontompɔ."

column2: "Na mma hom nnka me dzin ho ntam akɔhwi mu
column3: amma eennhura wo Nyankopɔn ne dzin ho: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma nndzi wo nyɛnko emim
column3: na mmbu no: mma mma ɔpaanyi n’akatua nnko wo hɔ anadwe nyinara ma adze nnkye."

column2: "Mma nndom otsitsifo
column3: na mmfa fintsidua nnto ofurafo enyim
column4: mbom suro wo Nyankopɔn: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ atsɛmbu mu dza ɔnntsen: mma nnhwɛ ohianyi enyim
column3: anaa nnsuro otumfo enyim: mbom tsenenee mu na bu wo nyɛnko atsɛn."

column2: "Mma nnkyin sor nye ase dɛ afakɔafabanyi wɔ wo nkorɔfo mu: nkyii so mma nnsoɛr nntsia wo nyɛnko no bɔgyaa: emi nye EWURADZE."
"Mma nntan wo nua wɔ w’akoma mu: ɔka na ka wo nyɛnko enyim
column3: na mma nnsoa bɔn wɔ ɔno ntsi."

column2: "Mma nndzi wer
column3: na mma nnya menasepɔw biara wɔ wo nkorɔfo mba ho
column4: mbom dɔ wo nyɛnko dɛ woho: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Hom ndzi m’ahyɛdze do. Mma mma wo fiembowa nndzi aforafora mmfofow hɔnho: mma mmfa aba horow ebien mmfora mu nndua wo haban mu: nkyii so mma atar a wɔdze atam horow ebien aforafora apam nnka woho."
"Na obiara a ɔnye ɔbaa bi da dze no ho nsu ma no
column3: na sɛ ɔyɛ afonabaa a wɔdze no ama okun bi awar
column4: na pon na wonnyae mmpoon no
column5: nkyii so wɔmmaa no fahodzi a; wɔntsea hɔn; mma wonnku hɔn

column2: "Na ɔmfa n’asodzi ho afɔr mbra EWURADZE
column3: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano
column4: mekyerɛ oguannyin na ɔmfa nyɛ asodzi ho afɔr no."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa asodzi ho afɔr oguannyin no mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim wɔ no bɔn a ɔayɛ no ntsi: na wɔdze no bɔn a ɔayɛ no bɛkyɛ no."
"Na sɛ hom du asaase no do
column3: na wɔtsetsɛw ndua horow biara a wodzi a
column4: ɔno hom mbu n’aba dɛ monomonomyɛdze: mfe ebiasa na ɔnyɛ dɛ monomonomyɛdze mma hom; mma wonndzi."

column2: "Mbom afe a otsia anan no n’aba nyinara nyɛ krɔnkrɔn
column3: mfa mma EWURADZE ayɛyi."

column2: "Na afe a otsia enum no hom ndzi n’aba bi
column3: ama wɔaama hom no ndɔbaa: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mma hom nndzi adze biara nye no bɔgya no: nkyii so mma hom nnkyer nkaber
column3: na wɔnnyɛ akɔmfodze."

column2: "Mma hom mmpompon hom tsinhwi ano
column3: nkyii so mma nnsɛɛ w’abɔdwesa ano."

column2: "Mma hom mmbobɔ hom honam ho akam biara mma ewufo
column3: na hom nnkyerɛkyerɛw hom ho nkyerɛkyerɛwee biara so: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma nngu wo babaa ho fi nnyɛ no edwaman; bɛyɛ na asaase no adan ndwamanyɛ
column3: na mbusu abɛyɛ asaase no do ma."

column2: "Hom ndzi m’ahomgyeda no
column3: na hom ndzi m’ahotseweebea no nyi: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma hom nndan nnkɔ hɔn a wɔyɛ adzebisafo
column3: nye esumamfo so hɔ: mma wɔnnhwehwɛ hɔn ekyir kwan mmfa hɔn nngu homho fi: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Fa enyidzi ma tsigon no
column3: nyew
column5: na suro wo Nyankopɔn: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi bɔsoɛ hom asaase do a
column3: mma hom nnyɛ no bɔn."

column2: "Ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hom no wɔmma ɔnyɛ dɛ hom mu kuromnyi bi
column3: na dɔ no dɛ woho; osiandɛ hom yɛɛ ahɔho wɔ Egypt asaase do: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Mma hom mmbu atsɛnkyew wɔ adzesusu mu
column3: adzeker mu

column2: "Nsɛn tsenn
column3: abrambo tsenn
column6: na hom mmfa nsusu: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do no."

column2: "Na hom nhyɛ m’ahyɛdze nyinara
column3: nye me ntsɛmbu nyinara nsew
column4: na wondzi do: emi nye EWURADZE."
